long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension works on the Data manager. It will allow you to click one time on a button instead of selecting every field from an object.

It has two main use cases;

1. Importing large amount of fields from the connector to Einstein Analytics
2. Select all the fields

Feel free to contact the developer if needed
